gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `ReservesAndFunds` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `ReservesAndFunds` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `ReservesAndFundsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReservesAndFundsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFundsMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ReservesAndFundsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ReservesAndFundsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfReservesAndFundsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFunds` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` en `DesignatedFundsMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `DesignatedFunds` zonder `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` en `DesignatedFundsMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFunds` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` en `DesignatedReservesMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `DesignatedReserves` zonder `ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis` en `DesignatedReservesMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfReservesAndFundsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
